ai-tha-ap334:2.1_0: if she struck the water with her hand;
ai-tha-ap334:2.2_0: they ejected space in the air.
ai-tha-ap334:2.3_0: I have cut off the belly,
ai-tha-ap334:3.4_0: I rejoice in this very life.
ai-tha-ap334:5.1_0: Though this sacrifice has been given up,
ai-tha-ap334:5.2_0: the world doesn’t stay in the world.
ai-tha-ap334:5.4_0: having left victory and defeat behind.
ai-tha-ap334:6.4_0: dwelling of the four primary elements.
ai-tha-ap334:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap334:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūja.
ai-tha-ap334:9.1_0: with water, lodgings, and the second of the senior monks.
